sentences.en: A strict diet is appropriate for only a few.
sentences.cn: 严格的食谱仅对少数人适用.

sentences.en: All members of the association adhere to a strict code of practice.
sentences.cn: 协会的所有成员都遵守一套严格的行为规范。

sentences.en: Four million Britons are now strict vegetarians.
sentences.cn: 目前有400万英国人是严格的素食者。

sentences.en: French privacy laws are very strict.
sentences.cn: 法国的隐私法非常严苛。

sentences.en: He has a reputation for being a strict disciplinarian.
sentences.cn: 他因是个严格纪律执行者而闻名遐迩。

sentences.en: He was a strict, old-school Freudian.
sentences.cn: 他是个不折不扣、传统守旧的弗洛伊德学说信奉者。
父母对我要求非常严格。

sentences.en: She admits to being strict with her children.
sentences.cn: 她承认对自己的孩子很严厉。

sentences.en: She has some old-fashioned values and can be a strict disciplinarian.
sentences.cn: 她的观念比较保守，有时过于严格地奉行纪律。

sentences.en: She was a very strict Christian who was married to her job.
sentences.cn: 她是个虔诚的基督徒，对工作全身心投入。

sentences.en: There is a strict dress code: no trainers or jeans.
sentences.cn: 有严格的着装规定：不许穿运动鞋和牛仔裤。

sentences.en: They must each compose a poem in strict alliterative metre.
sentences.cn: 他们必须每人作一首严格押头韵的诗。

sentences.en: Yasmin sticks to a strict vegetarian diet.
sentences.cn: 亚斯明坚持不沾一点儿荤腥。

phrases.tran_cn: 严格责任；严格赔偿责任
